mapper.select: SELECT mc.id AS mc_id, mc.create_time AS mc_create_time, mc.update_time AS mc_update_time, mc.`name` AS mc_name, mc.`order` AS mc_order, f.id AS f_id, f.create_time AS f_create_time, f.update_time AS f_update_time, f.image AS f_image, f.`name` AS f_name, f.price AS f_price, f.info AS f_info, f.menu_classify_id AS f_menu_classify_id, f.`order` AS f_order, f.practice_list AS f_practiceList, f.taste_list AS f_tasteList, f.weight_list AS f_weightList FROM menu_classify AS mc LEFT JOIN food AS f ON mc.id = f.menu_classify_id ORDER BY mc.`order` ASC ,mc.create_time DESC, f.`order` ASC, f.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_classify ( id, create_time, update_time, `name`, `order` ) VALUES ( #{id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (), #{name}, #{order} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ()
